# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(learn_opengl LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(learn_opengl "")
set_target_properties(learn_opengl PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "learn_opengl")
set_target_properties(learn_opengl PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(learn_opengl PRIVATE
    C:/Users/weitian.liang/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.3.8/d12e591897c9472fb7d3725fa5811388/include
    C:/Users/weitian.liang/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glad/v0.1.36/d58ee23747ff411aae74b40986460499/include
)
target_compile_definitions(learn_opengl PRIVATE
    GLFW_INCLUDE_NONE
)
target_compile_options(learn_opengl PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_FRONTEND_VARIANT STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(learn_opengl PRIVATE /EHsc)
else()
    target_compile_options(learn_opengl PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(learn_opengl PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(learn_opengl PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(learn_opengl PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET learn_opengl PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(learn_opengl PRIVATE
    glfw3
    opengl32
    glad
    user32
    shell32
    gdi32
)
target_link_directories(learn_opengl PRIVATE
    C:/Users/weitian.liang/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.3.8/d12e591897c9472fb7d3725fa5811388/lib
    C:/Users/weitian.liang/AppData/Local/.xmake/packages/g/glad/v0.1.36/d58ee23747ff411aae74b40986460499/lib
)
target_sources(learn_opengl PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
